entries.name: alert(statement, question = nil)
entries.desc: Displays an alert statement.  Asks a question if given.

entries.name: alert_error(statement, question = nil)
entries.desc: Displays an error statement to the error output location.  Asks a question if given.

entries.name: alert_warning(statement, question = nil)
entries.desc: Displays a warning statement to the warning output location.  Asks a question if given.

entries.name: ask(question)
entries.desc: Asks a question and returns the answer.

entries.name: ask_for_password(prompt)
entries.desc: Asks for a password with a prompt

entries.name: ask_yes_no(question, default = nil)
entries.desc: Asks a yes or no question.  Returns true for yes, false for no.

entries.name: choose_from_list(question, list)
entries.desc: Asks the user to answer question with an answer from the given list.

entries.name: say(statement = '')
entries.desc: Displays the given statement on the standard output (or equivalent).

entries.name: terminate_interaction(exit_code = 0)
entries.desc: Terminates the RubyGems process with the given exit_code

entries.name: verbose(msg = nil)
entries.desc: Calls say with msg or the results of the block if really_verbose is true.
